page.title: 04MR. BEST (contd.)
page.content: Mr. Best finds that as well as being able to socialise more easily, being president of his union has helped him gain in confidence. He visualises education in the future going towards more individual tutoring, and people wil use distance learning programs. He also believes that the school will be more of a comunity centre with both adults and children using its facilities. In his year of office Mr. Best hopes to achieve a successful conclusion to the present pay dispute between teachers and their employers. He would like to see a pay award to the teachers, he would also like to see an independent body set up to deal with the role of a teacher and salary structure.He would like all these things linked to a no-strike deal. These are his objectives.
